titleStmt.title: A mappe of Rome liuely exhibiting her mercilesse meeknesse, and cruell mercies to the Church of God: preached in fiue sermons, on occasion of the Gunpowder Treason, by T.T. and now published by W.I. minister. 1. The Romish furnace. 2. The Romish Edom. 3. The Romish fowler. 4. The Romish conception. To which is added, 5. The English gratulation.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

titleStmt.title: A mappe of Rome liuely exhibiting her mercilesse meeknesse, and cruell mercies to the Church of God: preached in fiue sermons, on occasion of the Gunpowder Treason, by T.T. and now published by W.I. minister. 1. The Romish furnace. 2. The Romish Edom. 3. The Romish fowler. 4. The Romish conception. To which is added, 5. The English gratulation.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sould [by Thomas Man] at the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster Row,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition dated 1619.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded and show-through; some pages marked and stained.
